item.text: The same thing happened in Iconium when Paul and Barnabas went into the Jewish synagogue and spoke in such a way that a large group of both Jews and Greeks believed.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> who <st data-num="544">refused to believe</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1892">stirred up</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2559" class="">poisoned</st> their <st data-num="5590" class="">minds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="1304" class="">stayed</st> there<n id="1" /> for a <st data-num="2425" class="">considerable</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st>, <st data-num="3955">speaking out courageously</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, who <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>, <st data-num="1325" class="">granting</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> to be <st data-num="1096" class="">performed</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="4128" class="">population</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="4977" class="">divided;</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">some</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510">sided</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">some</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>.

When <st data-num="5037">both</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> (together <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="758" class="">rulers)</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st><n id="1" /> an <st data-num="3730" class="">attempt</st> to <st data-num="5195" class="">mistreat</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3036" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="3" />

Paul and Barnabas<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4894" class="">learned</st> about it<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2703" class="">fled</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3071" class="">Lycaonian</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="3082" class="">Lystra</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1191" class="">Derbe</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4066">surrounding region</st>.
There they continued to proclaim the good news.
In Lystra sat a man who could not use his feet, lame from birth, who had never walked.

<st data-num="3778">This man</st> was <st data-num="191" class="">listening</st> to <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> as he was <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st>. When <st data-num="3739">Paul</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="816">stared<n id="2" /> intently</st> at <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> to be <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st>,

he <st data-num="3004">said</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, “<st data-num="450">Stand</st> <st data-num="3717" class="">upright</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the man<n id="2" /> <st data-num="242">leaped up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> began <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5037" class="">So</st> when the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="1869 5456">shouted</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="3072" class="">Lycaonian language</st>,<n id="2" /> “The <st data-num="2316" class="">gods</st> have <st data-num="2597" class="">come down</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3666" class="">in</st> <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="3666" class="">form</st>!”<n id="3" />

They began to <st data-num="2564" class="">call</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2203" class="">Zeus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2060" class="">Hermes</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1894" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> the <st data-num="2233">chief</st> <st data-num="3056">speaker</st>.

The <st data-num="2409">priest</st> of the temple<n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2203" class="">Zeus</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">located</st> just <st data-num="4253" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="5022" class="">bulls</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4725" class="">garlands</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the city <st data-num="4440" class="">gates;</st> he and the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="2380">offer sacrifices</st> to them.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> about<n id="2" /> it, they <st data-num="1284" class="">tore</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1530">rushed out</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, <st data-num="2896" class="">shouting</st>,<n id="5" />

“<st data-num="435">Men</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>? <st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="444">men</st>, with <st data-num="3663" class="">human natures<n id="1" /> just like</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>! We are <st data-num="2097">proclaiming the good news</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, so that you should <st data-num="1994" class="">turn</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3152">worthless<n id="3" /> things</st> <st data-num="1909">to</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>,<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3944" class="">past</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1074" class="">generations</st> he <st data-num="1439" class="">allowed</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="846">their own</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">ways</st>,

<st data-num="2543" class="">yet</st> he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="267">without a witness</st> by <st data-num="14">doing good</st>,<n id="1" /> by <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5205" class="">rain</st> <st data-num="3771">from heaven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2593" class="">fruitful</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">seasons</st>, <st data-num="1705" class="">satisfying</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="3" /> with <st data-num="5160" class="">food</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> with <st data-num="2167" class="">joy</st>.”<n id="4" />
Even by saying these things, they scarcely persuaded the crowds not to offer sacrifice to them.
But Jews came from Antioch and Iconium, and after winning the crowds over, they stoned Paul and dragged him out of the city, presuming him to be dead.
But after the disciples had surrounded him, he got up and went back into the city. On the next day he left with Barnabas for Derbe.
After they had proclaimed the good news in that city and made many disciples, they returned to Lystra, to Iconium, and to Antioch.

They <st data-num="1991" class="">strengthened</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5590" class="">souls</st> of the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> and <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st> them to <st data-num="1696" class="">continue</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, saying, “We <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">persecutions</st>.”<n id="4" />

When they had <st data-num="5500" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2596" class="">various</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">prayer</st> and <st data-num="3521" class="">fasting</st><n id="3" /> they <st data-num="3908" class="">entrusted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to the protection<n id="4" /> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> they had <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="1330">passed through</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4099" class="">Pisidia</st> and <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3828" class="">Pamphylia</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when they had <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4011" class="">Perga</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="2597">went down</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="825" class="">Attalia</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2547" class="">From there</st> they <st data-num="636">sailed back</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="490" class="">Antioch</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3606" class="">where</st> they had <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">commended</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> they had now <st data-num="4137" class="">completed</st>.<n id="3" />

When they <st data-num="3854" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">together</st>, they <st data-num="312" class="">reported</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3745">all the things</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> a <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> for the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.
So they spent considerable time with the disciples.
